scripts.dynamodb:local:create:conversations-cont: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name ${DYNAMODB_TABLE_NAME_CONVERSATIONS_CONTEXT} --endpoint-url ${DYNAMODB_ENDPOINT_URL} --attribute-definitions AttributeName=userId,AttributeType=S AttributeName=channelId,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=userId,KeyType=HASH AttributeName=channelId,KeyType=RANGE --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --region ${AWS_DEFAULT_REGION} --stream-specification StreamEnabled=true,StreamViewType=NEW_IMAGE --query TableDescription.TableArn --output text
scripts.dynamodb:local:create:constances: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name ${DYNAMODB_TABLE_NAME_CONSTANCES} --endpoint-url ${DYNAMODB_ENDPOINT_URL} --attribute-definitions AttributeName=configName,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=configName,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --region ${AWS_DEFAULT_REGION} --stream-specification StreamEnabled=true,StreamViewType=NEW_IMAGE --query TableDescription.TableArn --output text
